data.text:
Found inCartoon collection. I, 1985: opening credits for The friendly ghost (Famous Studios)

Internet movie database, Sept. 21, 2001 (Famous Studios; production company, distributor)

Wikipedia WWW site, viewed July 14, 2023 (Famous Studios was the first animation division of the film studio Paramount Pictures from 1942 to 1967; founded when Paramount seized control of the Fleischer Studios after the departure of its founders, Max and Dave Fleischer)
